title: CVE-2022-42442 (robotic_process_automation_for_cloud_pak)
description: "IBM Robotic Process Automation for Cloud Pak 21.0.1, 21.0.2, 21.0.3, 21.0.4, and 21.0.5 is vulnerable to exposure of the first tenant owner e-mail address to users with access to the container platform. IBM X-Force ID: 238214."
